verbs.description: In the 466 days since [ARG0: he] [V: took] [ARG1: the oath of office] , President Donald Trump has made 3,001 false or misleading claims , according to the Washington Post .
In the 466 days since he took the oath of office , President Donald Trump [V: has] made 3,001 false or misleading claims , according to the Washington Post .
